nodes.description: 11月某日，肯尼亚帕拉迪索酒店遭自杀式爆炸袭击，造成9名员工死亡，酒店完全损毁
nodes.support_text: Former staff at Kenya's Paradise Hotel, which was blown up last week, complain that they have not been paid. Nine of their colleagues were killed in the suicide attack on the Israeli-owned hotel near the coastal resort of Mombasa.

nodes.description: 爆炸后员工集体抗议未获拖欠薪资，部分员工称仅收到2000肯尼亚先令（25美元）年度工资
nodes.support_text: We depended on tips from the guests which was not enough, said Josephine Mbuli, 23, who worked as a hairdresser for three years to support her eight siblings and mother.

nodes.description: 酒店以色列经理耶胡达·苏拉米承诺尽快支付薪资，但遭员工嘘声反对
nodes.support_text: He tried to calm tempers during a demonstration and promised they would be paid soon. The staff booed him as he spoke.

nodes.description: 员工回忆酒店长期拖欠工资，管理层多次承诺未兑现，依赖客人小费维持生计
nodes.support_text: Some claimed they had received just 2,000 Kenyan shillings ($25) for a year's work at the Paradise. They say the managers repeatedly promised to pay them, but the promises were never kept.

nodes.description: 酒店被毁导致所有员工失业，23岁发型师约瑟芬·姆布利等员工失去收入来源
nodes.support_text: The hotel was completely destroyed by the attack, leaving the staff jobless.

nodes.description: 苏拉米承认未支付11月薪资，承诺补发9月欠薪，并已安排员工医疗救治及部分送医以色列
nodes.support_text: There's no question that November salaries have not been paid," Mr Sulami told reporters. "Some we also have to pay for September. But there's no question their salaries will be paid as soon as possible.

nodes.description: 酒店人力资源经理证实薪资拖欠问题，员工持续保持耐心等待
nodes.support_text: Human resources manager Valentina Sapaya, who had only been working there for a few months, said many people had told her that their wages had not been paid, despite repeated management pledges.

nodes.description: 爆炸后13名嫌疑人被逮捕，美国布什总统将袭击归咎于基地组织
nodes.support_text: Thirteen people have been arrested in connection with the attacks, which US President George Bush has blamed on the al-Qaeda network.

nodes.description: 爆炸后以色列客机从蒙巴萨机场起飞时遭导弹拦截
nodes.support_text: Shortly after the attack on the hotel, missiles narrowly missed an Israeli passenger plane as it took off from Mombasa airport.

nodes.description: 内罗毕英国高专馆接到威胁后疏散工作人员
nodes.support_text: In Nairobi, the British High Commission in Kenya has evacuated its staff from its building in Nairobi after a threat was received.

nodes.description: 路透社报道员工在演讲中起哄
nodes.support_text: Reuters news agency reported staff booing Yehuda Sulami during his speech
